ing: 1 fluid ounce bitter orange aperitif (such as CampariÂ®)
des: "If you like a Negroni and you like whiskey, too, give this one a try. It's a whiskey Negroni. Play with the ratios; I sometimes pull back on the sweet vermouth just slightly. This is also great served on the rocks."
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice; add whiskey, sweet vermouth, and Campari(R). Stir and strain into a chilled martini glass; garnish with lemon twist.
